subject: Wheel hub configuration
description_text:
Hi,

Received my steering wheel and hub today.

How do I program the whee hub switches?

Kind regards

Nick Allitt

conversations.body_text: Wheel button have now been configured.. Only one issue, the wheel downshifts by itself randomly. How to I fix this issue or does it need to be returned? Thanks Nick
Hi Nicholas Allitt,    We will have our support team resolve this for you as soon as possible.

Hi Nicholas Allitt,      Please record a video and send it to us via Google Drive, making sure the viewing permissions are set. We will check and analyze it for you. Additionally, please verify the grounding.      If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
